name: Hirschfelden Hunting Reserve
description: Modeled after German farmlands, Hirschfelden offers a diverse landscape of forests, fields, and lakes. This reserve provides excellent opportunities for hunting European species in a picturesque setting.

name: Layton Lake District
description: Inspired by the Pacific Northwest, Layton Lake District features dense coniferous forests, rolling hills, and pristine lakes. A perfect hunting ground for North American big game.

name: Medved-Taiga National Park
description: Based on the Siberian taiga, Medved-Taiga offers a challenging hunting experience in harsh, cold environments. Track dangerous predators and hardy prey through snow-covered forests.

name: Vurhonga Savanna Reserve
description: Representing the South African savannah, Vurhonga offers vast open plains and acacia woodlands. Experience authentic African hunting with diverse wildlife roaming the golden grasslands under the African sun.

name: Parque Fernando
description: Modeled after South American forests, Parque Fernando features lush rainforests and dense vegetation. Hunt unique South American species in this vibrant and challenging jungle environment.

name: Yukon Valley
description: Based on Alaska's fall season with light snow, Yukon Valley offers stunning autumn landscapes. Hunt North American big game through golden forests and rugged mountains in this breathtaking northern wilderness.

name: Cuatro Colinas Game Reserve
description: Inspired by Spain's corn fields and hills, Cuatro Colinas features Mediterranean landscapes with rolling hills and agricultural areas. Perfect for hunting European species in a warm, sunny climate.

name: Silver Ridge Peaks
description: Modeled after the Rocky Mountains, Silver Ridge Peaks offers dramatic alpine scenery with high peaks and valleys. Challenge yourself with long-range shots and high-altitude hunting in this majestic mountain reserve.

name: Te Awaroa National Park
description: Based on New Zealand's tall mountains and long coasts, Te Awaroa features stunning Pacific landscapes. Hunt unique introduced species in this beautiful island reserve with diverse terrain from beaches to peaks.

name: Rancho del Arroyo
description: Representing Mexico's hilly landscape and jagged terrain, Rancho del Arroyo features arid deserts and rocky canyons. Experience authentic Mexican hunting in this challenging and beautiful reserve.

name: Mississippi Acres Preserve
description: Located in the swamps of the southern United States, Mississippi Acres features wetlands, bayous, and dense forests. Perfect for waterfowl and whitetail hunting in classic southern hunting grounds.

name: Revontuli Coast
description: Based on Finland's cold mossy forests and big lakes, Revontuli Coast offers Nordic hunting in pristine wilderness. Experience northern European hunting with stunning aurora-lit landscapes and diverse boreal wildlife.

name: New England Mountains
description: Inspired by the states of the US in the New England region, this reserve features classic northeastern forests with colorful fall foliage. Hunt traditional New England game through hardwood forests and mountain ridges.

name: Emerald Coast
description: Based on the Australian coast and thick bushy forests, Emerald Coast features unique Australian wildlife. Experience hunting down under with exotic species in diverse habitats from coastal areas to dense bush.

name: Sundarpatan
description: Located in Nepal's swampy lowlands and tall snowy mountains, Sundarpatan offers dramatic elevation changes. Hunt Asian species from subtropical lowlands to Himalayan peaks in this stunning and diverse reserve.

name: Salzwiesen Park
description: Representing north German wetlands, Salzwiesen Park features coastal marshes and tidal flats. A compact reserve perfect for waterfowl hunting and experiencing the unique wildlife of the North Sea coast.

name: Askiy Ridge Hunting Preserve
description: Located in Alberta, Canada, Askiy Ridge features bitterly cold yet stunning snowy wilderness. This newest reserve offers 19 local species and 13 exclusive missions in breathtaking Albertan landscapes.
